summary: Now the fists of steel perk does 2x the base damage of your heavy gauntlets. Only guaranteed to work with vanilla heavy guantlets.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod adds a \"Fists of Ebony\" perk to the heavy armor tree that doubles the unarmed damage added by the Fists of Steel. For example, daedric gauntlets add 36 points of damage now, instead of 18.

Hope you enjoy. Feel free to leave comments if you think any changes should be made.
author: Jackfirecracker
